show.title: Gone, Yet Loved By Him
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/h62ZvM
show.description: For three years, Bellway Zouch loved Eason Gold — but she was only a substitute for his childhood sweetheart. When the truth breaks her, she decides to leave the country, giving herself one month to let go. Just as she finds the strength to move on, Eason realizes too late that his true love was Bellway all along. Watch Now!
show.description_secondary: For three years, Bellway Zouch loved Eason Gold — but she was only a substitute for his childhood sweetheart.
